content:
You fell prey to the whims of the Galtan mob and were scheduled for execution by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Final Blade]{Final Blade}, but through skill-or sheer luck-you managed to talk your way out of it.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Charisma or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the Deception skill and the Revolution Lore skill. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Charming Liar]{Charming Liar} skill feat.
name: Final Blade Survivor
